long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Little Giant Marketing's Celebration Extension is a unique Chrome add-on designed exclusively for insurance agents using our CRM solutions. This user-friendly extension activates a joyful confetti animation across the screen whenever an opportunity is updated to 'Policy Sold' in our CRM. It's a fun way to celebrate your achievements without disrupting your workflow. This lightweight and privacy-conscious tool requires no extra setup and integrates seamlessly, enhancing your CRM experience with a touch of celebration. Ideal for our CRM users, it acknowledges the hard work and success of insurance agents in a simple, yet delightful manner.
